name: OpenAI Sora
about: A cutting-edge AI model by OpenAI that generates realistic videos from text prompts.
summary: Describe a scene — watch it come to life as a video.
details: Sora is OpenAI’s advanced model that brings text descriptions to life as high-fidelity video. It’s designed for storytelling, concept art, and creative filmmaking.
howTo: Provide a text prompt describing the desired video.
Adjust parameters for style, motion, and framing.
Use the output for concept visualization or storytelling.
